amendment.description: To reduce the minimum distance of travel necessary for reimbursement of covered beneficiaries of the military health care system for travel for specialty health care and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1752 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1752 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8012) To reduce the minimum distance of travel necessary for reimbursement of covered beneficiaries of the military health care system for travel for specialty health care and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1752 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Boxer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1752 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
